resources.string: Get full control and advanced features over the glyph interface.
" Manually adjust the glow and brightness of each glyph"
Various tools and useful utilities for glyph.
Enables blinking of all glyphs (it will hurt your eyes)
Various glyph animations (will be updated in the future)
Suggestions for new features are actively accepted! Message me on Telegram: @username7052 (I answer in any language)
